	def save_data(self):
                """
                Saves the archived urls into archived_urls.dat

	def archive(self, url):
                """
                :param: url
                Archves a url into the wayback machine.
                """
		l = requests.get(self._arch+url)
		print("Archiving...")
		self.archived_urls.append(url)
		self.save_data()
